signals.summary: Humain, a Saudi state-backed firm, secured up to $1.2 billion in financing to expand AI infrastructure and data center capacity.

The Middle East Industrial Software Summit & Awards 2026 is exploring how industrial software, AI, and automation are redefining the future of manufacturing and industrial excellence across the Middle East.
PepsiCo used AI analytics on social media and consumption data to design new flavors and products, shortening the product innovation cycle.

Alat, a Saudi enterprise, is partnering with global innovators and universities to reimagine multiple industrial manufacturing processes and transform global electronics and advanced industrials, focusing on sustainability and energy efficiency.
IDC research commissioned by AWS and e& found that 74% of GCC organizations plan to adopt Agentic AI, yet only 19% have moved beyond pilots to full-scale deployment.
Inception, a UAE-based G42 company, is leveraging Kore.ai’s agentic platform to build intelligent assistants that streamline decision-making, governance, and operations across the enterprise.
PwC survey showed that 75 percent of employees in Middle East workplaces are using AI tools, which is a higher rate than the 69 percent global average.

profile.objective: Identify 20-25 net-new buying signals for AI transformation and digital modernization.
inclusion_rules: Target institutions that are buyers/adopters, not vendors.
Prioritize strategic initiatives with implementation budget signals.
exclusion_rules: Exclude Tier-1 global banks, Big Tech, and top global consultancies.

categories.label: Action Strength
categories.description: How concrete the institutional action is.

categories.label: Buyer Fit
categories.description: How likely the institution is to buy consulting/services.

categories.label: Seniority
categories.description: Decision-maker level tied to the signal.
